Geocorona bụ akụkụ na-egbuke egbuke nkè mpaghara kachasị elu nké ikuku ụwa, exosphere

A na-ahụ ya karịsịa site na ìhè ultraviolet (Lyman-alpha) sitere na Anyanwụ nké na-agbasasị site na hydrogen na-anọpụ iche. Ọ na-agbasa ruo na 15.5 radii nke ụwa na ikekwe ruo ihe dị ka otu narị radii nke Ụwa. A mụọla geocorona site na mbara igwe site na Satellite Astrid na ụgbọ mbara igwe Galileo (n'etiti ndị ọzọ), na-eji ultraviolet spectrometer (UVS) ya n'oge ụwa na-efe efe.
